pages.text: The Power Crystal item has a variable recipe. This means that, for each part, a different item may be placed. The parts are:$(li)the Nucleous, in the center position$(li)the Relays, in the center top and bottom$(li)the Screen, on the sides$(br2)Test out different recipes and see what is the best one for your puropose.

The Power Crystal has three traits:$(li)Power: the total power this crystal can contain. This may be recharged in the charger.$(li)Range: the range, in blocks, that this power crystal can deliver power to.$(li)Purity: the purity will determine the ammount of power wasted in air transmission when powering machines.$(br)Different items used in each of the three parts of the recipe will yield different traits.

List of possibilities:$(li)Nucleous: Snowball, Diamond, Mysterious Rod, Blaze Rod, Imprisoned Light and Shard Catalyst.$(li)Relay: Stone, Quartz Block, Redstone Block, Endstone, Moonstone, Lapis Lazuli Block, Smooth Azurite, Mystic Iron Block, Soulsteel Block$(li)Screen: Glass, Scorch Glass, Crystal Block, Nether Crystal Block and Packed Ice.$()$(br2)To place a power crystal in the world simply right click with it in your hand.
